Subjects randomize placebo treatment group receive placebo tablet ( identical appearance apremilast 30 mg tablet ) orally twice daily 16 week . Beginning Week 16 , subject initially randomize placebo switch receive apremilast 30 mg BID additional 36 week ( 52 week total ) . Study enroll adult patient stable moderate plaque psoriasis , naïve systemic psoriasis treatment . The primary efficacy endpoint assess Week 16 mean percentage change baseline product body surface area ( BSA ) ( % ) static Physician 's Global Assessment ( sPGA ) .
